narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this first pre-license inspection for an exhibitor "C" license.
OK to license.
Applicant will send license fee to APHIS, Animal Care Western Regional Office. 
 
No regulated activity may be conducted until receipt of the USDA license.
The inspection and an exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
